SEARCH
Package cocoa.controller

Class BondpairController

java.lang.Object
cocoa.controller.BondpairController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/bondpair") public class BondpairController extends Object
Controller for managing animal families (Bondpair) and their associated pets. Provides endpoints for adding, querying, updating, and deleting bondpairs, as well as changing the adoption status of a bondpair.

This controller interacts with the BondpairService to perform operations on bondpair entities and their related data. It also makes use of the CategoryService to retrieve the category information for bondpairs.

      Parameters:
      page - the current page number
      pageSize - the number of records per page

      Returns:
      a paginated result of bondpairs
